title: A Quiet Afternoon
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Fuu.... This tea is good, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, what a great cafe. The classical piece that they’re playing creates such a calming atmosphere. A perfect way to spend an afternoon....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>By the way, Maki-san, have you heard of the School Idol Rangers....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh....? Aaah, I think so, yeah. It’s that pretend-play thing that Setsuna and Rin were doing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Pretend-play.... Is it really just that? Ruby was reading and practicing a complete script of a play, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeeh!? When did all of that happen!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Umm, it seems like it has become quite the thing. Did they not send a script your way, Maki-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Now that you mention it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s probably better to check immediately....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez~! Give me back my quiet afternoon~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
